item.title: Reply from McDonald’s Global Compliance Office
item.description: From: McDonald’s Global Compliance Office (business.integrity@us.mcd.com) Subject: Re: Have you received my communications? Please acknowledge receipt. Date received: November 19, 2019 at 01:19 (Beijing time) To: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) [Victim’s first name] - Our apologies for not responding, however, it appears that we did not receive your communications. Could you provide us with the information that you previously provided? Thanks. Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2019-11-19-reply-from-mcdonalds-global-compliance-office_Redacted.
